description: There is a chest nearby which contains a stone pickaxe and an iron pickaxe. The stone pickaxe may mine iron ore but not diamond. The iron pickaxe may mine either ore. There are separate mounds of iron and diamond ore nearby with 12 iron ore and 6 diamond ore.

tasks.Gizmo: Maximize emeralds where each 'raw iron' in your inventory is worth 4 and each 'diamond' is worth 4
tasks.Glitch: Maximize emeralds where each 'raw iron' in your inventory is worth 3 and each 'diamond' is worth 5
